Order Plan Materials

Get hard copies delivered

You can order any of the items below free of charge. Please submit each item individually if you would like to order more than one.

Select one plan item below:

Shipping Address

The materials will be sent to the permanent address you have on file. If you have questions or would like an item sent to a different address, please contact UnitedHealthcare.
